Master Spotter: Perception Master
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Skill Mastery: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)/Skill Master (Choose 1 from any)
Skill Training (Aquatic Lore): Skill Trained (Aquatic Lore)
Assurance (Absalom Lore): Can take an automatic 17 on Absalom Lore checks
Clue In: (R) Gives another creature +1 on the triggering Perception or skill check that will help to answer an active investigation question once per 10 min
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Keen Recollection: +5 on untrained Recall Knowledge checks
Pursue A Lead: Can use 1 min examining a detail to detect a deeper mystery; success allows opening an investigation and gives +1 on later Perception and skill checks when attempting to answer a central question about it
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead and can be targeted with a DC 5 flat check
Skill Stratagem: (1) Refrains from attacking a chosen creature to gain +1 on the next intelligence-, wisdom-, or charisma-based skill or Perception check involving it before the start of the next turn
Combat
Hit Points: 68 Armor Class: 22 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 20 (strength; trained); Investigator: 14 (intelligence; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bola (+12 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+12 1d4+3 B; strength; expert); Main-gauche (+12 1d4+3 P/S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Bombs): Attack Master (Simple Bombs; Martial Bombs)/Attack Expert (Advanced Bomb Weapons)
Investigator Dedication: Class Trained (Investigator)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Lance): Weapon Familiarity (Lance)
Aggressive Block: (F) Shield Block moves foe 5' or inflicts off-guard (foe's choice)
Attack Stratagem: (1) Uses a pre-rolled value for the first attack vs. a chosen creature before the start of the next turn
Brutish Shove: (1) Two-handed melee Strike inflicts off-guard until the end of the turn; success also allows an automatic Shove
Combat Assessment: (1) Melee Strike allows an immediate Recall Knowledge about the target; a critical hit gives a +2 bonus
Double Slice: (2) Makes simultaneous Strikes with 2 melee weapons at the current multiple attack penalty; a non-agile weapon on the second Strike suffers -2 attack
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Intimidating Strike: (2) Successful melee Strike inflicts frightened 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit
Lunge: (1) Makes a melee Strike with +5' range
Parting Shot: (2) Steps away from a foe and makes a ranged Strike with the target off-guard
Point Blank Stance: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 HP damage within the first range increment of a ranged non-volley weapon
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Twin Parry: (1) Parrying with a melee weapon in each hand gives +1 Armor Class, or +2 Armor Class if either weapon has the parry trait, until the start of the next turn
Vicious Swing: (2) Melee Strike inflicts 1 extra damage die and counts as 2 Strikes for the multiple attack penalty
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +12 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Deduction Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and basic deduction feature (currently 1)
Barbarian Instinct Allocation: 0 available vs. 1 allocated
Barbarian-Spirit Instinct Selectable Feature: Requires barbarian level
Class Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 17 allocated
Keen Recollection Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and investigator dedication feature (currently 1)
Master Spotter Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, ranger dedication feature or investigator dedication feature (currently 1) and perception rank (currently 3) >= 2
Skill Mastery Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8, rogue dedication feature or investigator dedication feature (currently 1) and max skill rank (currently 2) >= 2
